body.p:
182
October 24th 3
Thomas W. Hewitt
A. A. Surg. U S A
Jefferson Barrack's Mo.
Sir
Yours of the 21st inst, applying for promotion has been referred by the Governor to this office.
Such promotions ^or appointments^ according to an established rule in this Department are made upon the recommendation of the officer commanding the Regiment.
If you will procure such recommendations, a commission will be issued to you immediately.

Respectfully
John Boyle
Adj. Gen Ky.
